scripts.start:article-service: cd backend/article-service && npm install && npm start
scripts.start:user-service: cd backend/user-service && npm install && npm start
scripts.start:order-service: cd backend/order-service && npm install && npm start
scripts.start:payment-service: cd backend/payment-service && npm install && npm start
scripts.start:favorites-service: cd backend/favorites-service && npm install && npm start
scripts.start:cart-service: cd backend/cart-service && npm install && npm start
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend/breizhsport-frontend && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.start:services: concurrently "npm run start:article-service" "npm run start:user-service" "npm run start:order-service" "npm run start:cart-service" "npm run start:favorites-service" "npm run start:payment-service"
